quests.name: Rescue the Blacksmith
quests.description: The local blacksmith, Gronn Ironforge, has been kidnapped by goblins from the nearby caves. The town needs his skills to repair weapons and armor.

quests.name: Clear the Goblin Caves
quests.description: A group of goblins has taken up residence in the caves north of town. They've been raiding merchant caravans and terrorizing travelers.

quests.name: The Missing Merchant
quests.description: Trader Bendek Stonehill left town three days ago bound for Neverwinter and hasn't been seen since. His wife fears the worst.

quests.name: Investigate the Haunted Manor
quests.description: Strange lights and eerie sounds have been reported from the old Blackwood Manor. Locals believe it's haunted and want someone to investigate.

quests.name: Escort the Scholars
quests.description: A group of scholars from Candlekeep needs safe passage to the ancient ruins east of town. The road is dangerous and they require protection.

quests.name: The Dragon's Hoard
quests.description: Ancient legends speak of a dragon's treasure hidden deep within Mount Grimfang. Only the bravest adventurers would dare seek such a prize.

quests.name: Bandit Leader Bounty
quests.description: The notorious bandit leader 'Red Jack' has a 500 gold bounty on his head. He's been spotted near the crossroads south of town.

quests.name: The Corrupted Grove
quests.description: The sacred grove of the local druids has been corrupted by dark magic. The trees are withering and animals are fleeing the area.
